content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You will have a conversation with Tian Silin, the teacher organizing Chinese Culture and Environmental Protection Day for your school’s Chinese Club, about volunteering to help plan the event. Prompt 1

Prompt 1

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
